projects.name: PT Maulana International (Flip Automation Integration with Third-Party AI API) - 2024
projects.description: Developed Flip automation integration with GPT-based third-party AI API to improve the efficiency of financial transaction management. The solution enables automated processes such as data validation, analysis and reporting quickly and accurately. By incorporating AI capabilities for natural language processing, the system can provide deeper insights and accelerate decision-making. This project demonstrates expertise in integrating payment technology with artificial intelligence to create innovative solutions.

projects.name: PT Maulana International (Time Tracker with Live Screen Sharing) - 2024
projects.description: Time Tracker is a tool for startup companies to monitor remote employee productivity. It helps managers track work time, check daily activities, and detect idle moments automatically. With live screen sharing, managers can supervise work in real-time, ensure transparency, and maintain quality. Intuitive dashboards provide easy access to activity reports, productivity insights, and work data to support better decisions. This app makes managing remote teams easier, improves coordination, and builds a scalable work environment.

projects.name: PT Maulana International (ChatSift) - 2024
projects.description: ChatSift is a tool for scraping, processing, and analyzing chat data, emotes, images, and videos from Slack. Built with Express.js, Puppeteer, Axios, and Web Sockets, the data is managed in MongoDB. The UI, based on Tailwind CSS, provides easy navigation, scraping controls, analytics, and real-time reports.

projects.name: PT Maulana International (Discord Chat Scraper) - 2024
projects.description: Discord Chat Scraper is a powerful tool designed to scrape, process, and analyze chat data from Discord servers. Built with a robust backend using Express.js, it employs Puppeteer for automated browser interactions, Axios for API requests, and Web Socket for real-time communication. The data is stored in a scalable MongoDB database, while the frontend is styled with Tailwind CSS. The application can generate reports in various formats using PDF Kit and Exceljs, making it an all-in-one solution for data extraction, transformation, and reporting.

projects.name: PT Petrokimia Gresik - Human Resource Information System (HRIS) Development - 2024
projects.description: HRIS is a system designed to facilitate online attendance employees with mobile application (Flutter), Employee Reimbursment system , E-Administration for employees (Create digital transformation for secure document archive, and Employee Approval administration)

projects.name: Kementrian Energi Dan Sumber Daya Mineral Minerba One Data (MOD) - 2024
projects.description: Kementrian Energi Dan Sumber Daya Mineral Minerba One Data (MOD) is a system designed to facilitate the management of data in the mining sector, from the management of mining companies, mining permits, mining production, and other data.

projects.description: Bank Indonesia X Lampung Begawi is a system designed to facilitate the management of events, from the management of event participants, event schedules, event speakers, and other event data.

projects.description: Internal System Aliansyah ERP is a system designed to facilitate the management of company data, from the management of company employees, customers, suppliers, products, sales, purchases, and other data.

projects.description: PPDB PPS Fathul Ulum is a service system designed to facilitate the automation of the implementation of New Student Admissions (PPDB), from the new student registration process, selection to announcement of selection results through the system.

projects.description: Luluk Store (POS) System is basically a management system for store, where a system user can add, update and delete item from menu and generate bills.

projects.name: Wild vs No Wild Classification (CNN) - 2022
projects.description: Wild vs No Wild : Flask app Using Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) to recognize wild vs no wild animal with very high accuracy up to 95%
